welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glanerbrug, the charming town known for its picturesque landscapes, friendly locals, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Twente Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
